scripts.build: ng build dsgov-components --prod && ng build dsgov-angular-demo
scripts.pack-lib-prod: ng build dsgov-components --prod && npm run pack-lib
scripts.pack-demo: cd dist/dsgov-angular-demo && tar zcvf dsgov-angular-demo.tgz * && cp dsgov-angular-demo.tgz ../../docker/nginx/dist.tar.gz
scripts.docker-build-demo: docker build -f docker/nginx/Dockerfile -t fabianorodrigo/dsgov-angular-demo docker/nginx/ && docker tag fabianorodrigo/dsgov-angular-demo:latest fabianorodrigo/dsgov-angular-demo:0.3.8
scripts.k8s-deploy-demo: helm upgrade --install  dsgov-angular-components --kube-context newdev --namespace dsgov-angular-components-dev ./chart/dsgov-angular-demo && kubectl --context newdev --namespace dsgov-angular-components-dev set image deployment/dsgov-angular-demo dsgov-angular-demo=fabianorodrigo/dsgov-angular-demo:0.3.8
